title: Pytorch's Participation in GSOC 18!!
body_html:
Hi I am a Pytorch user and a GSOC 17 participant. I want to discuss the possibility of Pytorch's participation in GSOC 2018. Personally, I think this would be great way to engage young developers who may later become core developers and help in maintaining Pytorch, meanwhile achieving some key milestones for Pytorch as part of their project. more info can be found here https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/
What do you guys think about it?

Personally, I think this would be great way to engage young developers who may later become core developers and help in maintaining Pytorch, meanwhile achieving some key milestones for Pytorch as part of their project. more info can be found here https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/
